content: TORONTO/SAN FRANCISCO The neo-Nazi website Daily Stormer had its internet domain registration revoked twice in less than 24 hours in the wake of the weekend violence in Charlottesville  Virginia  part of a broad move by the tech industry in recent months to take a stronger hand in policing online hate-speech and incitements to violence.
name: GoDaddy Inc
title: Tech companies in the crosshairs on white supremacy and free speech
